meaningMnemonic: You want to <radical>change</radical> your <radical>shellfish</radical> into <kanji>freight</kanji> so you can transport it. That means packing them up into giant freight containers.
readingMnemonic: To move this <kanji>freight</kanji>, you need a <reading>ca</reading>r (か). You strap all of the freight containers to the top of your car, stacked nice and high and precarious, so you can move it.
